solution.text: The simplest form of _{j}_:_{{j+1}}_ = \(\frac{_{j}_}{_{{j+1}}_}\). Similarly, the simplest form of _{{j+1}}_:_{{j+2}}_ = \(\frac{_{{j+1}}_}{_{{j+2}}_}\). We know that equivalent ratios when expressed in their simplest forms are equal. Therefore, the above two ratios are not equivalent.
